item.title: Sound Fixes Pack v25.01 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | January 15, 2025

Sound Fixes Pack v25.01 ATS

CHANGELOG v25.01
Improved accuracy of the 3D sound position of the reefer unit sound for default reefer trailers in AI traffic. [ATS edition]
Comprehensive sounds added to the Siemens Vectron train locomotive. [ETS2 edition]
Comprehensive sounds added to the Corifer FS Vivalto train. [ETS2 edition]
Reduced low frequency for two Carrier Vector reefer unit sound loops. [ETS2 edition]
Reduced low frequency for the default reefer unit sound loop.
Decommissioned ‘Return to Winterland’ soundtrack music replacements.
Decommissioned sounds for the Winter Express steam train.
Christmas discount ended for aftermarket air horns from the Sound Fixes Pack in the game’s Service Shops.

DESCRIPTION
This mod has been bringing more immersion to common sounds in the game for over 9 years!

It packs a variety of sound content within one mod, making it great value within the 100 mod limit in Convoy multiplayer.

COMPATIBILITY
– ETS2 1.53.3 + ATS 1.53.2. No errors in game log. Must have high priority in Mod Manager.
– Does not replace individual player truck sounds, so this mod can be used with an unlimited amount of truck sound mods of your choice.
– Compatible with all maps and all trucks, including truck mods.
– Supported in single-player and multiplayer Convoy mode, and is marked as an optional mod in Convoy.

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
Requires higher priority in Mod Manager than:
– any map mods (e.g. ProMods)
– any AI traffic mods (e.g. traffic packs and traffic pack add-ons)
– any rain sound mods

FEATURE LIST
The mod features meticulously crafted sounds, covering the following:

– Suspension and tire bump sounds for your truck and trailer.
– Fuel / filling station sounds.
– Door close and seatbelt sounds after refueling.
– Train sound enhancements for several locomotives and railroad cars.
– Country/state specific railroad crossing bell sounds.
– The most complete tire sound package for all terrains: asphalt, gravel, grass, snow, and sleeper lines.
– Wet tire sound for the player’s truck tires when the asphalt roads are wet.
– Reworked tire screech/skid sound effects.
– Nokia phone ringtone sound replacing the hurry up / late music, leading to less stress for the player.
– Default common sound reworks, such as improved default air brake sounds.
– AI traffic vehicle sound improvements, with engine and horn sounds uniquely set for specific vehicles.
– English AU/UK/US voice navigation variants with speaker effect added and uncustomary phrases removed.
– Wind buffeting and rush of air sounds at high speeds only when the window is open.
– More environmental and ambient sounds, and tasteful changes to existing ambient sounds in the game world.
– Trailer coupling, trailer brace rotation, and trailer sliding axle sounds.
– 5 standalone air horns.
– Dynamic rain sounds, and an assortment of different thunder sounds with delay.
– Default gear grinding sound effect additions and improvements.
– Stronger reverb effects when under bridges and overpasses.
– (ATS only) Drawbridge lift warning sound for the Columbia River Interstate Bridge.
– (ATS only) Working sounds for the Musical Road on the Historic Route 66.
– (Optional) Reefer / refrigerated trailer sound functionality.
– (Optional – ATS only) Cop scouting reports via CB radio (enable in voice navigation options).
– Fixes for World Ambient sound glitches from the vanilla game and/or mods.

For further immersion, the mod may also include official paint colors and more authentic specifications for each AI traffic vehicle it modifies for sound. Rarer paint colors are less likely to be seen.

Credits: SCS Software, Drive Safely, antonvezdehod, Darkcaptain, Frontiersman, Grinch, Katixa, Kriechbaum, Max2712, Trayscapes, Vasily (Engine Voice Records), Zeemod

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Portugal Rebuild v0.1.4.2 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | January 15, 2025

Portugal Rebuild v0.1.4.2 1.53 ETS2

Changelog v0.1.4.2
– Fix for the issue that was causing some powerlines in Promods to disappear

Description:
This mod consists of recreating and improving Portugal.
– New logistics areas
– Real Companies
– VTC Companies
– New Cities
– New Roads

Compatible Versions:1.53

Credits: xVirus_37

item.title: Hybrid Plus Road Connection v1.0 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | January 15, 2025

Hybrid Plus Road Connection v1.0 1.53 ETS2

Hybrid 1
Roextended 4.5 – Rusmap 2.51 – Promods 2.73a – Poland Rebuilding 2.5.11

Hybrid 2
Roextended 4.5 – Rusmap 2.51 – Promods 2.73a – Middle East add-on – Poland Rebuilding 2.5.11

Place this above all 4 map files in mod manager.
Game version 1.53.x only

Credits: Sergey,Arayas,PM,Michaleczeq

item.title: B110 – DK94 Connection v1.1 (1.53) ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | January 15, 2025

B110 – DK94 Connection v1.1 (1.53) ETS2

Changelog v1.1
– bugs fixed
– compatible with ETS2 1.53 | Promods 2.73a | Poland Rebuilding 2.5.11

Makes the Secret Road between Anklam and Świnoujście visible
Promods and Poland Rebuilding are necessary for the mod to work

Compatibility 1.53

Credits: Fynn1510
